help.name: Select
details: Allow selecting multiple contact for creating email

help.name: Sorting
details: List the contacts (Last Name, First Name) in alphabetic order

help.name: Filters
details: Filters for division, section and/or team

help.name: Configurations
details: Configurations on toolbar, tab, displaying and searching
Users could customize their favorite options depending on their needs

help.name: What's New
details: Display any detailed information for iStaff App

help.name: All Staff
details: List contact information of all staff
Display options could be customized via Configurations

help.name: Custom Division
details: List contact information of any specified division which could be customized via Configurations > Tab Options

help.name: Useful Contact
details: List the common useful contact information

help.name: Toolbar
details: Allow customizations of toolbar features, including 'About', 'Select', 'Sorting', 'Filters' and 'Configurations'

help.name: Tab
details: Allow customizations of tab features, including 'What's New', 'All Staff', 'Custom Division' and 'Useful contact'

help.name: Display
details: Allow customizations of display features, including 'Avator', 'Name', 'Email', 'Division', 'Telephone', 'Mobile' and 'Post'

help.name: Search
details: Allow customizations of search features, including 'Full Name', 'Telephone', 'Mobile', 'Email', 'Post', 'Email', 'Division', 'Section' and 'Post'
